title: Parachute
description: An open parachute floating through the air with a human steering. Most platforms feature a ram-air design. Colors vary across platforms.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the parachute emoji features a vibrantly colored canopy, likely depicted in red and white or blue and white, unfurled and suspended in the air, showcasing Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges that give it a tactile, almost tangible quality. Realistic lighting highlights the fabric's curves and folds, suggesting a gentle descent against a clear sky, symbolizing adventure, freedom, and the thrill of taking a leap. This emoji is perfect for conveying excitement about new endeavors, the feeling of liberation, or the anticipation of a daring experience.
